question:
Buildings are producing some specific goods by using some other specific goods.
the price of goods is determined by supply and demands of that goods. If suppely is larger than demand, goods price goes lower than base price, vice versa.
Too much high input goods price will make buliding useless.
Which of the following buildings would be the most effective to construct?
goal: Note that our goal is decreasing the market price of goods name: Steel,
